title: Enhancing Programming Practical Competencies: Instructional Design Model Evaluation Based on Authentic Task-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design real-world elementary mathematics problem-solving tasks and evaluate them by applying the five principles of instructional design models (activating prior knowledge, modeling demonstrations, providing repeated practice opportunities, coaching feedback, and connecting to personal life).
Learners can measure the effectiveness of instructional design models through peer and self-assessment using three criteria (academic achievement, task satisfaction, and goal mastery).
Learners can complete a summative assessment task by submitting instructional design improvement proposals using collaboration tools in Zoom video conferencing platforms and BYOD environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
